title: Replace AFKEr's with Bots
body:

replies.body:
pretty sure a dumb bot would be worse than an AFK


AFK> feeder
i hope you guys know this is a troll, he made a post a few days ago that was the exact same thing lol

I hope you know that makes no sense,

who said there is a post limit

you feel smart

and im going to continue to post this because i had a feeder/rage quitter on my team i rather have bots than quitters

god no. i would rather be playing 4v5 than have a dumb bot on my team.

at least i have a chance of winning 4v5 by all of us being better than the enemy team. if the bot starts feeding we can't stop it and it gives the enemy team an advantage that they wouldn't have otherwise.

plus, bots don't group or teamfight, don't take baron or dragon. they just lane.

Yup, it's better (also fun sometimes) to play 4 vs 5 than having a bot. Bot's don't gank also when attacked while moving between lanes will not attack back, they have 1% map awareness, itemization is .. they don't.  I can go on.

How about sharing/splitting the AFK's experience + gold to rest of the team? That will be balanced.
You didn't play bot games much when you were leveling up, did you?
these will be super sayain bots
